summary: Skilled relationship-builder who is able to establish easy rapport with customers, building trust and respect. Highly service-oriented individual who is responsive to need and thorough in follow-through. Organized, effective multitasker with excellent coordination skills and a keen attention to detail.

experience.title: Member Services Representative
experience.description: Promoted from Cashier to Lead Cashier to help train staff and facilitate morning huddles. Among the top 10% advisers in Telephone Banking in 2011 and 2012. Peer coach for new and existing employees; led and facilitated team meetings in the absence of a manager; promoted self-service and provided guidance on OPERS benefits and services; focusing on timely and quality service.

experience.title: Risk Operations Analyst II
experience.description: Pinpointed fraud trends specific to online money movement; researched monetary transactions on Chase.com to ensure validity and security of customer accounts; collaborated across lines of business to improve service and reduce delays in online money movement.

experience.title: Risk Operations Analyst
experience.description: Handled high-volume inbound calls from internal Chase colleagues and account holders needing assistance with deposits, fraud, AML, KYC, and related processes; detected fraud to prevent losses; provided peer coaching and SME support to analysts and new hires.

experience.title: Senior Service Specialist
experience.description: De-escalated customer issues; investigated and solved complex problems; collaborated with site leaders to investigate complaints and implement improvements; maintained records of correspondence and discussions; identified issues affecting policies and processes.

experience.title: Customer Service Specialist
experience.description: Maintained up-to-date knowledge of products, services, and policies; participated in special projects; managed inbound calls (80-150 daily); assisted customers with products and services; processed orders, online troubleshooting, and claims; achieved monthly goals and participated in team meetings; provided peer coaching.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Developed packets about social service agencies and programs; wrote reports describing offenders' progress.

experience.title: Customer Service Specialist
experience.description: Monitored checkout stations and ensured adequate cash; processed payments; assisted customers with information and resolutions; handled receipts, refunds, and exchanges; sold tickets; performed merchandise returns; managed cash handling and customer inquiries; provided online assistance and navigation.

education.degree: Associate of Arts in Criminal Justice Sociology
